node.excerpt:
Metamorphosis is the fourth design from the We are Animals I series, a 
series of pieces portraying great minds wronged by humanity’s thoughts. 
This piece shows Vincent van Gogh, the famous Post-Impressionist painter. 
Even today, some people are still not too familiar with the details about…

frontmatter.title: Metamorphosis
frontmatter.description: This piece shows Vincent van Gogh, the famous Post-Impressionist painter who lived his entire life in obscurity, recognized by his genius only after his death.
